feed.title: Voltaserve Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(misc): Postgres connection pool by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/604

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v3.1.4...v3.1.5

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.1.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ci(misc): specify working directory for go mod download by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/605
  • fix(idp): keep alive interval for Postgres by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/606

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v3.1.5...v3.1.6

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.1.7

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v3.1.6...v3.1.7

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.1.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(misc): image field by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/610

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v3.1.7...v3.1.8

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.1.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(api): image endpoint by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/611
  • refactor(ui): improve UI/UX to match iOS/macOS by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/608

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v3.1.8...v3.1.9
